provider.name: Vodafone Greece
provider.description:
Obtains balance and other plan information on Vodafone Greece personal account (http://www.vodafone.gr)
If you don't have Vodafone personal account, please register here: http://www.vodafone.gr/portal/client/cms/viewCmsPage.action?pageId=8441
provider.author: AnyBalance Team <info@anybalance.ru>
